Rowan K. O’Hara

linkedin twitter github email

I am a first-generation college student passionate about research in biological data science. My research at the POP-GEM Lab focuses on examining cross-ancestry phenotypic and genetic associations with major depression and determining if interpersonal violence exposure is correlated with depression symptoms and if these associations vary by sex. This fall, I will attend the University of Maryland, Baltimore’s Epidemiology and Human Genetics doctoral program to progress toward becoming an academic researcher and professor.
